text.text: How to Edit Imported Remittance Credit Amounts?

text: To edit imported remittance credit amounts, you can follow these steps: 1. On the Line-item Editor page, click the amount under the "Provider paid" heading. 2. The subsequent "Line-item detail" window displays the credit allocation. 3. Click Edit. 4. On the next Line-item editor page, make the modifications to the applicable fields and then click Post transaction.

text.text: How can I Edit Imported Remittance Credit Amounts?

text: To edit imported remittance credit amounts, you can follow these steps: 1. On the Line-item Editor page, click the amount under the "Provider paid" heading. 2. The subsequent "Line-item detail" window displays the credit allocation. 3. Click Edit. 4. On the next Line-item editor page, make the modifications to the applicable fields and then click Post transaction.

text.text: What happens If the line-item is for an imported remittance?

text: If the line-item is for an imported remittance, the next payer and status block on the Line-item Editor page will not display.
